item.title: About
item.description: I’m a product driven, full stack software engineer from Toronto. I’m passionate about creating world class user experiences that raise the bar on usability, accessiblity and most importantly, happiness. I thrive in innovative, fast paced environments and love to work with creative, driven individuals. Programming is not my only focus, I’m interested in fintech, design, product management and much more. I love learning and am always teaching myself something new.

item.title: Blog
item.description: Here you can find my thoughts on various topics including programming, technology and more!
